item.title: Apache Spark: Dataset vs Dataframe - The Tortoise and Hare
item.description: Introduction Hi, welcome to my first blog post. This post is the first one in a series of many that will follow. Who is Tortoise and who is Hare? Well, In many books about Apache Spark that I was reading, I didn’t found a clear idea of the performance of dataframes compared to the datasets. In this blog post, we will debunk that mystery and show some concrete results and insights regarding this matter.
